Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Panedjem II; seven rows of Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 53 [22]. Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 109
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2005 Oct-2006 Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 6 Oct-2007 18 Feb, Tokyo National Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2015, 19th June - 5th Sept. Wrexham County Borough Museum. Egyptian Written Culture. 2016 12 Mar-8 May, Carlisle, Tullie House, Writing for Eternity 2016 20 May-4 Sept, The Salisbury Museum, Writing for Eternity 2016 16 Sept-10 Jan 2017, Abergavenny Museum, Writing for Eternity 2017 21 Jan-21 May, Museum of Hartlepool, Writing for Eternity
